definition: cotangent (of angle), written cot θ or ctg θ
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

sentences.english: Most of us can’t tell our secant from our cotangent.
sentences.chinese: 我們中的大多數不能分辨正切餘切。

sentences.english: It actually represents the Frog Kok of Cotangent value.
sentences.chinese: 它實際上代表了轍叉角的餘切值。

sentences.english: In this paper, we study the symplectic groupoids structure on the cotangent bundle of Lie group.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了李羣的餘切叢上的辛羣胚結構。
